messages.message: Loctax has difficulties extracting all month data from this document. List extraction seems to work (screenshot 1) but as soon as you switch on table detection, the results became incorrect (screenshot 2). They also need to detect tables so cannot switch off table detection. Can someone please help look into it?
Thanks for sharing this feedback @Bastiane - @andy flagging another request from loctax on contributing to an app lineage. I'll add this to the JIRA ticket.
Yes, that's mentioned above along with language support :top:
On language support, I don't think we'll ungate for now until we hear more feedback. Google OCR is quite expensive, which is also why it's behind the gate

@Rakesh who can help look into the digitization issue when table detection is turned on? In the second screenshot, the text looks a little misaligned, which may be contributing to the inaccurate result
